content.div:
Last week's Jonuserific episode of Smash brought attention (and viewers) back to NBC's musical gamble and if a just-released video is anything to go by, this week will see the ratings continue their uptick.

In this clip from the March 4 episode, aspiring bad girl Karen (Katharine McPhee) continues her sexed up makeover by giving a Marilyn Monroe-worthy rendition of the James Brown classic “It's a Man's World” as she watches herself strip in her bedroom mirror.

Of course, being NBC, the former Idol runner-up doesn't go full monty, but the big finale is certainly enough to give any viewer a seven year itch.

Check out the video on GQ.com.

jond@dose.ca

entry.title: Smash Cheat Sheet

link.Abstract: Keep up with the multitude of stars, directors, creators, love-interests and former American Idol finalists that appear in the run-up to the show-within-a-show production of Marilyn.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: NBC is betting big on Smash, the musical TV show that's set to be the season's breakaway hit. So to help you keep up with the multitude of stars, directors, creators, love-interests and former American Idol finalists that appear in the run-up to the show-within-a-show production of Marilyn, we've put together this cheat sheet. Check back each week as we add new characters as they appear.
link.title: Smash Cheat Sheet

link.Abstract: Watch a scene from NBC's hottest new show, Smash. In it, Broadway producers search for an actress to play Marilyn Monroe.

link.Abstract: Tuesday, Mar. 6 – New Girl [Fox/Citytv, 9.00 p.m. ET/PT] The gang plays a game of touch football which leave poor Nick with an injury. For some reason, dude doesn't have a doctor so Jess ends up taking him to her OBGYN, because that's how things are done in TV land.
